name: Chaithra Navada
position: Urban Planning | Equity | Sustainable Mobility | Road Safety
about: An Urban planning Masters student with a dual concentration in Transportation and Economic Development at UCLA. I previously graduated with an MA from IIT Madras, India with a major in Development studies and Economics for minor. I’m curious and passionate to understand how mobility shapes people's empowerment and what makes cities prosper.

current_company.name: TJKM Transportation Consultants
current_company.title: Urban Planning | Equity | Sustainable Mobility | Road Safety

experience.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
experience.description: Spring 2023- Sole instructor for an undergraduate seminar titled  ‘Biotechnology and Health in Cities’. - Initiating 20 first year students in identifying the linkages between urban planning and health outcomes. - Designing and leading 3-hour seminars inclusive of lecture, writing instruction, and student-led discussions. Fall 2022-Winter 2022- Teaching Assistant for the year-long Biotechnology and Society Cluster  leading two 2-hour discussions. - Facilitated discussions, and provided research and writing guidance to ~40 first year students.  Fall 2021- Spring 2022- Teaching assistant for three courses in the domain of science, technology, health, policy, and economics at the Institute of Society and Genetics. - Facilitated in-person & online discussions, administered & graded assessments for ~60 upper division students, resulting in consistent student rating >8/9
experience.description_html: Spring 2023- Sole instructor for an undergraduate seminar titled ‘Biotechnology and Health in Cities’. - Initiating 20 first year students in identifying the linkages between urban planning and health outcomes. - Designing and leading 3-hour seminars inclusive of lecture, writing instruction, and student-led discussions. Fall 2022-Winter 2022- Teaching Assistant for the year-long Biotechnology and Society Cluster leading two 2-hour discussions. - Facilitated discussions, and provided research and writing guidance to ~40 first year students. Fall 2021- Spring 2022- Teaching assistant for three courses in the domain of science, technology, health, policy, and economics at the Institute of Society and Genetics. - Facilitated in-person & online discussions, administered & graded assessments for ~60 upper division students, resulting in consistent student rating >8/9

experience.title: Graduate Student Researcher
experience.description: - Supported research on equity and climate goals setting and implementation in the regional transportation planning process of California’s Metropolitan Transportation Organizations - Archival research through RTP documents, project lists, EIR, and related documents of five MPOs to identify evidence for discretionary decision making in RTP.
experience.description_html: - Supported research on equity and climate goals setting and implementation in the regional transportation planning process of California’s Metropolitan Transportation Organizations - Archival research through RTP documents, project lists, EIR, and related documents of five MPOs to identify evidence for discretionary decision making in RTP. <!---->

experience.title: Graduate Intern
experience.description: - Formulated terms of reference for a World Bank-led study on urban economics to gather inputs for Third Master Plan for the city- Assisted in developing a land value determination methodology for the Tamil Nadu state’s Land Pooling Scheme after a comparative analysis of international land pooling schemes- Framed state’s official 25-year urban vision, and contributed to internal team discussions, and consultant meetings on studies under progress at CMDA.
experience.description_html: - Formulated terms of reference for a World Bank-led study on urban economics to gather inputs for Third Master Plan for the city- Assisted in developing a land value determination methodology for the Tamil Nadu state’s Land Pooling Scheme after a comparative analysis of international land pooling schemes- Framed state’s official 25-year urban vision, and contributed to internal team discussions, and consultant meetings on studies under progress at CMDA. <!---->

experience.title: Planning Consultant
experience.description: - Conceptualized project proposals from member’s office on active transportation, public space conservation, and women safety for Safe City funds of USD 12M and Singara Chennai Project.- Led consultation with stakeholders including the Chennai Smart City Limited, Greater Chennai Corporation, NGO representatives for gathering facts and vetting the proposals.
